thread.title: Egypt to delay second international bond issuance: minister - Economy - Business
thread.title_full: Egypt to delay second international bond issuance: minister - Economy - Business - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Egypt to delay second international bond issuance: minister - Economy - Business
text:
Related Egypt to issue at least $1 billion international bonds in 2015: Official Fitch gives Egypt 'B' rating for new US dollar bond Egypt will delay its second international bond issuance, which was initially planned for November, the finance minister said on the sidelines of a conference on Monday.
"After we announced our intention there was some turbulence following turbulence in the Chinese financial market that had a negative effect on liquidity in the global markets in general, especially on investors who intended to invest in growing markets," Finance Minister Hany Kadry Dimian said.
"So we found that it is for the best to delay our issuance."
